name: jssm-viz
description: Visualization of JSSM machines using viz.js

scripts.clean: rimraf build -f && rimraf dist -f && rimraf docs -f && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir terser && cd .. && mkdir dist && mkdir docs && cd docs && mkdir docs && cd ../src/ts && rimraf -f generated_code && mkdir generated_code && cd ../..
scripts.make: npm run clean && npm run version && npm run typescript && npm run rollup
scripts.changelog: rm -f CHANGELOG.md && rm -f ./src/doc_md/CHANGELOG.md && better_git_changelog -b && cp CHANGELOG.* ./src/doc_md/
scripts.audit: text_audit -g ./src/ts/*.ts -t MAJOR WASTEFUL ANY MIXED FIXME CHECKME TESTME STOCHABLE TODO COMEBACK WHARGARBL
scripts.build: npm run make && npm run audit && npm run dist
scripts.nyc-build: npm run make && npm run test-verbose && npm run audit && npm run nyc-test
scripts.dist: cp build/rollup/jssm-viz.* dist/ && cp src/html/* docs/ && cp dist/* docs/ && cp node_modules/viz.js/lite.render.js docs/ && cp node_modules/viz.js/viz.js docs/
scripts.travis: npm run nyc-test && npm run coverage

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
